name: Mr.NooO!!
description:
The famous "Mr." is back on your device!
Push the button while dodging and evading from "those things"!
Enjoy this excilerating action game!
This time, his name is...."Mr.NooO!!"

Simple control
1.Touch & Hold the left of the screen to run!
2.Touch & Hold the right of the screen to run backwards!
3.And dodge & evade "that thing"!

That's all!

Push the button to decrease the clearing time!

Just stay alive from "those things" and
you will see why he's called "Mr.NooO!!" when you fail!

Presented by PONOS
